name: Kids Fun MUSIC Lite - Free Educational Music Game for Preschool Kids and Toddlers
name_original: Kids Fun MUSIC Lite - Free Educational Music Game for Preschool Kids and Toddlers
description:
Music instrument for kids is a learning game full of fun and entertainment.
A kid can play any instrument on his own.
This game will give basic introduction of all musical instruments like xylophone,keyboard,drums,Tambourine,castanets, steel pan , etc.
They can make their own beats and rhythm with realistic sound.

Fun and enjoyable to learn and play with great music instruments, this is a must have app!
A lot of educational music games for toddlers and young kids!!
Your child will admire every kind of musical instruments and will hear real sound effects!

Ideal for children but also fun for adults who want to play with their kids!
This app is a memory trainer for all the family ! A fun brain training app for kids!
